text: Weed is a Gold who attended The Institute of Mars from 737 to 738 PCE and is one of the original Howlers.
name: Weed

text: Weed is thin, which is what earned him his nickname. Like Pebble and Clown, Weed wears his hair in a mohawk. As a Howler, he wears a wolf cloak and has a tendency to howl as they go into battle.
name: Weed

text: At the Institute, Weed is drafted into House Mars. He is considered a lowDraft, one of the 'dregs' of the House, because he lacks the physical and mental prowess of the mid and highDraft Golds. When House Mars splinters into four tribes within the first four days of the war game, Weed becomes part of Darrow and Cassius' group. After the downfall of Titus, Darrow puts Weed under Sevro's command alongside Screwface, Thistle, Pebble, and Clown. Together, they become the first Howlers. When House Mars captures the castle of House Minerva, Weed is one of the Howlers to hide in the dead horses.
name: Weed

text: After graduating from The Institute, Pebble and the Howlers are reassigned to Pluto thanks to the machinations of Pliny au Velocitor, but are eventually summoned to Luna by Virginia in late 741 PCE so that they can be on standby to protect Darrow and House Augustus during the January 742 Summit. Weed dies during the Lion's Rain after an EMP detonates nearby and kills the power of his gravBoots and StarShell armour, dragging him to the bottom of the river, where he ultimately drowns.
name: Weed
